        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Properties properties)

      • isUseIDDLoginForm

        boolean isUseIDDLoginForm()
        Indicates if provider should use IDD login form
        Returns:
        true if login provider works via native IDD login form

      • redirectToProviderLoginPage

        void redirectToProviderLoginPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                 String returnUrl)
                          throws LoginProviderException
        Redirects to providers's login page
        Parameters:
        request - which used here to colllect data for redirection
        response - which should provide proper redirection
        returnUrl - should be added to redirection link so provider can return results on that url
        Throws:
        LoginProviderException

      • extractLoginCredentials

        LoginCredentials extractLoginCredentials(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                  throws LoginProviderException
        Extracts login credentials specific for a provider from request if they exist
        Parameters:
        request - to check if it contains credentials
        Returns:
        login credentilas for subsequent login procedure
        Throws:
        LoginProviderException

      • requestLoginCredentials

        LoginCredentials requestLoginCredentials(String username,
                                         String password)
                                  throws LoginProviderException
        Directly requests provider for login credentials (a case when provider's login form is not needed)
        Parameters:
        username - introduced by user
        password - introduced by user
        Returns:
        login credentilas for subsequent login procedure
        Throws:
        LoginProviderException

      • encodeComponentUrl

        String encodeComponentUrl(String url)
                   throws LoginProviderException
        Enhances a given url with provider's specific information in order to avoid direct login procedure
        Parameters:
        url - - URL value which should be enhanced with provider's parameters
        Returns:
        URL with required parameters added by provider
        Throws:
        LoginProviderException

      • onLogout

        void onLogout(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

      • getLogoImageBody

        InputStream getLogoImageBody()
        Method for retrieving custom logo image. It returns any instance of InputStream of known image formats (png, jpeg, gif, tiff). IDD will handle this InputStream as a source of image and will make an attempt to detect image type using javax.imageio.ImageIO class.
        Returns:
        Instance of InputStream with image body or NULL if provider doesn't support custom logo.
